content.raw:
The link line:

~~~
/usr/bin/c++   -O3 -DNDEBUG
    -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/groovy/stacks/pr2_mechanism/pr2_controller_manager/lib
    -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/groovy/stacks/pr2_mechanism/pr2_mechanism_model/lib
    -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/groovy/stacks/pr2_mechanism/pr2_controller_interface/lib
    -pthread
    CMakeFiles/actionlib_server.dir/actionlib_server.cpp.o
     -o
    bin/actionlib_server
    -rdynamic
    -L/opt/ros/groovy/stacks/pr2_mechanism/pr2_controller_manager/lib
    -L/opt/ros/groovy/stacks/pr2_mechanism/pr2_mechanism_model/lib
    -L/opt/ros/groovy/stacks/pr2_mechanism/pr2_controller_interface/lib
    -L/opt/ros/groovy/lib
    -L/home/osrf/local/lib
    -L/home/osrf/local/lib/gazebo-1.8/plugins
    -L/home/osrf/projects/drcsim_2.5/build_release/plugins
    -L/home/osrf/projects/drcsim_2.5/ros/atlas_msgs/../../plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64
    -L/home/osrf/projects/drcsim_2.5/plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64
    -L/home/osrf/local/lib/drcsim-2.5/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8
    -lpr2_controller_manager
    -lpr2_mechanism_model
    -lkdl_parser
    -lurdf
    -lurdfdom_sensor
    -lurdfdom_model_state
    -lurdfdom_model
    -lurdfdom_world
    -lcollada_parser
    -lrosconsole_bridge
    -lorocos-kdl
    -lrospack
    -l:/usr/lib/libpython2.7.so
    -l:/usr/lib/libboost_program_options-mt.so
    -limage_transport
    -ltinyxml
    -lclass_loader
    -lPocoFoundation
    -ldl
    -lroslib
    -lconsole_bridge
    -ltf
    -lmessage_filters
    -lactionlib
    -lroscpp
    -l:/usr/lib/libboost_signals-mt.so
    -l:/usr/lib/libboost_filesystem-mt.so
    -lrosconsole
    -l:/usr/lib/libboost_regex-mt.so
    -l:/usr/lib/liblog4cxx.so
    -lxmlrpcpp
    -lroscpp_serialization
    -lrostime
    -l:/usr/lib/libboost_date_time-mt.so
    -l:/usr/lib/libboost_system-mt.so
    -l:/usr/lib/libboost_thread-mt.so
    -lpthread
    -lcpp_common
    -lAtlasSimInterface
    -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/groovy/stacks/pr2_mechanism/pr2_controller_manager/lib:
               /opt/ros/groovy/stacks/pr2_mechanism/pr2_mechanism_model/lib:
               /opt/ros/groovy/stacks/pr2_mechanism/pr2_controller_interface/lib:
               /opt/ros/groovy/lib:
               /home/osrf/local/lib:
               /home/osrf/local/lib/gazebo-1.8/plugins:
               /home/osrf/projects/drcsim_2.5/build_release/plugins:
               /home/osrf/projects/drcsim_2.5/ros/atlas_msgs/../../plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64:
               /home/osrf/projects/drcsim_2.5/plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8/lib64:
               /home/osrf/local/lib/drcsim-2.5/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.8:
~~~

look pretty much identical to my machine here, and I am unable to reproduce the issue either.  Somehow your linking step does not appear to be stripping unused symbols.  Try adding compile flag below in your `ros/atlas_msgs/CMakeLists.txt`:

        add_definitions("-ffunction-sections")

and see if that helps.

Here's my `c++ --version` output for comparison:

        c++ --version
        c++ (Ubuntu/Linaro 4.7.2-2ubuntu1) 4.7.2
        Copyright (C) 2012 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
        This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
        warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

    add_definitions("-ffunction-sections")

and see if that helps.
